abstract.t: This document specifies procedures for how IPv6 Hop-by-Hop options are processed at routers and hosts. It modifies the procedures specified in the IPv6 Protocol Specification (RFC8200) to make processing of IPv6 Hop-by-Hop options practical with the goal of making IPv6 Hop-by-Hop options useful to deploy and use in the Internet. When published, this document updates RFC8200 and RFC7045.
